item.title: Is anything wrong with this because i keep getting 28 errors =[
item.dc:creator: @kambo77 kambo77
item.description:
@kambo77 wrote:

if(i == 14145) // change this if you need to “item number”
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Drive”;//New option
class8.anInt174 = 14145; //
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.anInt204 = 28;
class8.anInt165 = 14145;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 14145;//female wearing
class8.anInt204 = 28;
class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown
class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Pink Lamborghini Reventon”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A pink Lamborghini Reventon made by Vreg.”.getBytes();
}
if(i == 14146) // change this if you need to “item number”
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Drive”;//New option
class8.anInt174 = 14146; //
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.anInt204 = 28;
class8.anInt165 = 14146;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 14146;//female wearing
class8.anInt204 = 28;
class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown
class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Yellow Lamborghini Reventon”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A yellow Lamborghini Reventon made by Vreg.”.getBytes();
}
